header.author: John Morland
header.title: A RATIONAL ACCOUNT OF THE CAUSES OF CHRONIC DISEASES. WHEREIN A NATURAL, EASY, AND SAFE WAY OF PREVENTING, AS WELL AS CURING, THOSE DISEASES, IS POINTED OUT; AND THE TRUE ORIGIN OF THE HIPPOCRATIC METHOD OF PRACTICE BRIEFLY EXPLAINED. THE SECOND EDITION. To which are annexed, New Strictures on the Theory of Fevers, and on the Sanctorian Doctrine of Perspiration. WITH An APPENDIX on DIET and EXERCISE.
